title: We shall have a grand time Up in Heaven We shall have a grand time up in heaven Have a grand time Walking with the angels, Singing glory, alleluia! We shall have a grand time Up in Heaven Have a grand time
lyrics: We shall have a grand time Up in Heaven We shall have a grand time up in heaven Have a grand time Walking with the angels, Singing glory, alleluia! We shall have a grand time Up in Heaven Have a grand time
